articleData.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype
articleData.author: Daniel Cox
articleData.summary: Vex Monsters is a fantasy 2D platforming game, where you save monsters from an evil mysterious villain.

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 1
paragraph.description: Vex Monsters is a fantasy 2D platforming game, where you save monsters from an evil mysterious villain.

image.name: Monster Island 1.0
image.description: This is the world map of the game.

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 2
paragraph.description: It has been two years since we started this project. There is an entire level to play on with trees, monsters, enemies, caverns and much more. The objective is to save the monsters in the cages throughout the level from enemies. They will follow you back to home and help you on your conquest. Once at their home, the mother of the monsters you were saving will attack you, enraged because it got possessed by a dark spirit. She becomes much bigger than she usually is and has purple spikes. Once you defeat it, some of the monsters you saved will join your party while others stay behind with their mother.

image.name: Level 1 Pre-Alpha
image.description: This is a sneak peek of the level.

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 3
paragraph.description: Before you begin the first level, there is a place where you can gear up on supplies and learn how to play (move, jump, shoot a gun, etc.) and learn about what is your mission and what the game is about via intro cutscene.

image.name: Mission HQ Level Pre-Alpha
image.description: This is the place where you gear up!

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 4
paragraph.description: Currently the level is working. You can fight the boss and save monsters from evil, among the other game mechanics.

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 5
paragraph.description: Not completed in the demo yet is the place to gear up, and the intro cutscenes. We plan to rebuild  the gameplay and level in Unity using the Unity Scriptable Object Game Architecture and C# Event System with Unity Events. The recreation will include the same features as before but will be improved on and rest will be added as well.

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 6
paragraph.description: This game is currently in Pre-Alpha. A demo prototype is available via itch.io to play!

paragraph.name: Vex Monsters: Pre-Alpha Prototype Paragraph 7
paragraph.description: The team is a small group. We have Designers, Programmers, and QA Testers. I am the Lead Developer/Team Leader. I direct the team via Trello project boards and weekly Scrums or Check Ins via Discord. I also program the logic and user interface of the game from moving the player, ai, dialogue, NPC, cutscenes, game manager for audio, checkpoints, player lifes, level objective, and other game mechanics. Finally I wrote the story from the overview, backstory, chapters, dialogue, cutscenes, storyboards, and world information.

resources.name: Monstrous Ent Twitter
resources.description: Follow us on Twitter to keep up to date our game!

articleData.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023
articleData.author: Daniel Cox
articleData.summary: Never since 2013, I have been creating gaming videos for YouTube. They range from let's plays, tutorials, reviews and much more.

paragraph.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023 Paragraph 1
paragraph.description: Never since 2013, I have been creating gaming videos for YouTube. They range from let's plays, tutorials, reviews and much more. I started from the ground up and know nothing about making a video for YouTube. Start with Let's Play (play the game through and teach them how to bet the game or story, follow and enjoy my commentary that sort of thing). Then I went off, doing tutorials in Minecraft (teach people how to create something in that game) that were automatic farms or learning how a mod works in Minecraft.

paragraph.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023 Paragraph 2
paragraph.description: Every single video, I edited in Movie Studio Platinum, a low down version of Sony Vegas, and until this day, I still know it inside and out. I became fantastic at making tutorial videos as long as I knew what I was talking about. I learned the tag system and how to market the video, but most of that thing I forgot over the years because I couldn't keep it up, and school and work was more important to me. This always was a hobby for me, and it will continue to be that.

paragraph.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023 Paragraph 3
paragraph.description: That said, I had planned out every video I made for YouTube and edited them, and most of them are amazing videos, and I am very proud of each one I have created.

paragraph.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023 Paragraph 4
paragraph.description: Here are a few of my videos.

video.name: Minecraft - Mod Showcase - Ender Storage - MC Version 1.10.2+
Minecraft Tutorial - Automatic Sugar Cane Farm - 1.7.3 Beta+, 1.0-1.6+

paragraph.name: YouTube Gaming 2013 - 2023 Paragraph 5
paragraph.description: Here is a teaser of what is to come!
